prompts.title: Social Media Content Calendar Generator
prompts.description: Generates a detailed 30-day content calendar for social media marketing tailored to solopreneurs.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Social media strategist
OBJECTIVE: Generate a 30-day content calendar for [COMPANY NAME, e.g., 'TiltedPrompts']
CONTEXT: The content calendar should include daily posts, graphics, and themes. Posts must align with the brand's voice and target audience.
INPUT FORMAT: JSON array of days
OUTPUT FORMAT: JSON object with date, post title, post content, graphics URL, hashtags
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure all dates are in MM/DD/YYYY format, each day has a unique theme, and posts do not exceed 120 words. Graphics must be square (1:1 aspect ratio).
prompts.use_case: Creating a structured social media plan for small business owners to manage their online presence effectively.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert social media strategist. You will generate a detailed 30-day content calendar in JSON format based on the provided company name and brand guidelines.
example_user_messages: Create a structured 30-day social media plan for 'TechGenius'
example_outputs: {"2023-11-01": {"post_title": "Welcome to TiltedPrompts!", "post_content": "Introducing our innovative AI solutions. #TiltedPrompts", "graphics_url": "https://www.tiltedprompts.com/welcome.jpg", "hashtags": ["#AIInnovation"]}, ...}

{"2023-11-05": {"post_title": "TechGenius Solutions Announced!", "post_content": "Discover our latest tech solutions. #TechGenius", "graphics_url": "https://www.techgenius.com/announcements.jpg", "hashtags": ["#Innovation"]}, ...}

packaging.description: A structured blueprint that generates a detailed 30-day social media content calendar for small business owners, ensuring consistent and engaging online presence.

pricing_tiers.free: Limited to one company name per month
pricing_tiers.pro: $25 - Includes customer support and advanced customization options
